name: Private Space
description:
Explore a mysterious spaceship in this dungeon crawler puzzle.This is an UNFINISHED PROJECT made for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021 !
We will update the game after the voting phase is over.

CONTROLS  : 
- WASD to move
- QE to rotate
- Mouse click an drag and drop to interact or

A short game made by Ouiche Doctor and Thob, music by Thibault Manfredi.
